trans-unit.source: Represents a named argument of a custom attribute in the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 表示仅反射上下文中的自定义属性的命名自变量。

trans-unit.source: Code that is being examined in the reflection-only context cannot be executed, so it is not always possible to examine custom attributes by creating instances of them and then examining their properties, using methods like <xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 正在检查仅反射上下文中的代码不能执行，因此它并不总是可以检查自定义特性，通过创建它们，然后检查其属性、 使用等方法实例<xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，依次类推.

trans-unit.source: If the code for the attribute type itself is loaded into the reflection-only context, it cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性类型本身的代码加载到只反射上下文中，不能执行它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument> structure is used by the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> class to provide access to a named argument specified for a custom attribute instance, without executing the code of the corresponding property of the custom attribute type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument>结构由<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData>类以提供对为实例指定的自定义特性，而不执行自定义属性类型的相应属性的代码的命名自变量的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.TypedValue%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument> structure that contains the type and value of the named argument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.TypedValue%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument>结构，其中包含的类型和命名自变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Whether an argument is named or positional, you must access its type and value by using the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument> structure.
trans-unit.target: 名为参数还是位置，你必须访问其类型和值使用<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument>结构。

trans-unit.source: To create instances of the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData> class, use the `static`<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData.GetCustomAttributes%2A> factory method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的实例<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData>类，而使用`static`<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeData.GetCustomAttributes%2A>工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个具有四个构造函数与四个属性的自定义特性。

trans-unit.source: Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: 两个属性是只读的并且由使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。

trans-unit.source: The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 其他两个属性为读/写，并可以只能通过使用命名参数进行设置。

trans-unit.source: One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers.
trans-unit.target: 一个位置属性为一个字符串，数组，一个命名的属性为整数的数组。

trans-unit.source: The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Different constructors are used for these cases.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays information about the custom attributes that were applied to it and to the type and members it contains.
trans-unit.target: 在执行时，程序集将自身加载到只反射上下文，并显示有关已应用到它及的类型和成员，它包含自定义特性的信息。

trans-unit.source: The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 应用于该类型的属性演示数组属性，使用位置和命名自变量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A field or property of the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> object represents this member and its value.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 对象表示此成员及其值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the field or property of the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的字段或属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> class, which represents the specified field or property of the custom attribute, and specifies the value of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 类（它表示自定义属性的指定字段或属性）的新实例，并指定字段或属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is for use by inheritors of the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument> class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数仅供使用的继承者<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument>类。

trans-unit.source: It is not intended for use in application code.
trans-unit.target: 它不用于在应用程序代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="memberInfo" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="memberInfo" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="memberInfo" /> is not a field or property of the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="memberInfo" /> 不是自定义属性的字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: A field or property of the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性的字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> object represents this member and its value.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 对象表示此成员及其值。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes the type and value of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: 一个描述字段或属性的类型和值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> class, which represents the specified field or property of the custom attribute, and specifies a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument" /> object that describes the type and value of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 类（它表示自定义属性的指定字段或属性）的新实例，并指定描述字段或属性的类型和值的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is for use by inheritors of the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument> class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数仅供使用的继承者<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument>类。

trans-unit.source: It is not intended for use in application code.
trans-unit.target: 它不用于在应用程序代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="memberInfo" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="memberInfo" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此实例进行比较的对象，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等于此实例的类型和值，则为 <paramref name="obj" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the named argument is a field.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定参数是否是一个字段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the named argument is a field; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名参数为字段，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attribute member that would be used to set the named argument.
trans-unit.target: 获取将用于设置指定参数的特性成员。

trans-unit.source: The attribute member that would be used to set the named argument.
trans-unit.target: 将用于设置命名参数的特性成员。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the member is a property.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，成员是属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the attribute member that would be used to set the named argument.
trans-unit.target: 获取将用于设置指定参数的特性成员名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute member that would be used to set the named argument.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置命名参数的特性成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The structure to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: 相等运算符左侧的结构。

trans-unit.source: The structure to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: 相等运算符右侧的结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> structures are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 结构是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> structures are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 结构相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The structure to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: 不等运算符左侧的结构。

trans-unit.source: The structure to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: 不等运算符右侧的结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> structures are different.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 结构是否不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> structures are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument" /> 结构不同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that consists of the argument name, the equal sign, and a string representation of the argument value.
trans-unit.target: 返回由参数名称、等号和的字符串表示的参数值组成的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that consists of the argument name, the equal sign, and a string representation of the argument value.
trans-unit.target: 由参数名称、等号和的字符串表示的参数值组成的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument" /> structure that can be used to obtain the type and value of the current named argument.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument" /> 结构，该结构可用于获取当前指定参数的类型和值。

trans-unit.source: A structure that can be used to obtain the type and value of the current named argument.
trans-unit.target: 一个结构，可用于获取当前命名参数的类型和值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument> structure only contains information about how the argument value was set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument>结构仅包含有关如何设置参数值的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument> structure that contains the type and value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于获取<xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeTypedArgument>结构，其中包含的类型和值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a custom attribute with four constructors and four properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义使用四个构造函数和四个属性的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: Two of the properties are read-only, and are set by using the positional parameters of the constructors.
trans-unit.target: 两个属性是只读的并且由使用位置参数的构造函数的设置。

trans-unit.source: The other two properties are read/write, and can be set only by using named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 其他两个属性为读/写，并可以只能通过使用命名参数进行设置。

trans-unit.source: One positional property is an array of strings, and one named property is an array of integers.
trans-unit.target: 一个位置属性为一个字符串，数组，一个命名的属性为整数的数组。

trans-unit.source: The attribute is applied to the assembly, to a type declared in the assembly, to a method of the type, and to a parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 该特性可应用于程序集、在该程序集中声明的类型、该类型的方法以及该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Different constructors are used for these cases.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况下使用不同的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: When executed, the assembly loads itself into the reflection-only context and displays the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在执行时，程序集将自身加载到只反射上下文，并显示自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The attribute that is applied to the type demonstrates array properties, with both positional and named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 应用于该类型的属性演示数组属性，使用位置和命名自变量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.TypedValue%2A> property is used in the `ShowAttributeData` method that displays custom attribute data, to obtain the types and values of named attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeNamedArgument.TypedValue%2A>属性用于`ShowAttributeData`显示自定义属性数据时，若要获取的类型和值的方法名称的属性。
